last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: One day, a woman Kotaro doesn't recognize comes to pick him up from kindergarten. She says she's Karino's ex-girlfriend.

name: Kotaro Lives Alone
overview: A lonely little boy moves into a ramshackle apartment building all on his own and makes friends with the broke manga artist who lives next door.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A strange four-year-old boy named Kotaro moves into Shimizu Apartment all on his own. He doesn't seem to have any parents or family around.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Karino figures out why Kotaro talks the way he does: he's copying Tonosaman, his favorite cartoon character from a show that's about to end.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When he sees someone handing out free balloons, Kotaro tries to collect as many as he can. But there's a reason he wants so many balloons.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Kotaro's friend Kakeru has a maid who takes care of everything for him, so Kotaro decides to show Kakeru how to do things for himself.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: For some reason, Kotaro is very particular about his tissues. He wants expensive, soft ones because they're "sweet." Later, Karino figures out why.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A man named Aota moves into the building for a month. When he asks Kotaro to be his friend, Karino gets suspicious — and a little jealous.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A girl named Kana starts coming over to Kotaro's house to play everyday after kindergarten, but she never seems to have fun.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Karino brings Kotaro and all his friends to the movies. Kotaro wants to see the new Tonosaman film, but the other kids want to watch something else.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Whenever Kotaro goes to see the neighborhood dentist, Dr. Ohba always takes the time to talk to him and ask him lots of questions.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: One day, a woman Kotaro doesn't recognize comes to pick him up from kindergarten. She says she's Karino's ex-girlfriend.
